        public Tool(javafx.scene.image.Image image,

        Creates a new Tool.
        Parameters:
        image - graphic to be used for this tool
        name - name of this tool
        description - description of this tool
        type - internal identification of this tool
        parent - parent menu
        bar - toolbar that this is on
        pane - pane that contains the toolbar
